SELECT e.emp_id AS empId, e.emp_name AS empName, e.gender AS gender, e.address AS address, e.birthday AS birthday, e.authority AS authority, e.dept_id AS deptId, d.dept_name AS deptName FROM employee e LEFT JOIN department d ON e.dept_id = d.dept_id WHERE e.emp_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{empName}, '%') ORDER BY e.emp_id ASC;
